content:
OracleBoolean Struct

Definition

Represents the value returned from a database comparison operation between Oracle data types, and exposes methods used to perform data type conversions.

In this Article

public struct OracleBoolean : IComparable
Inheritance
Object
System.ValueType
OracleBoolean

Remarks

The key difference between an OracleBoolean structure and a standard Boolean value is that, where a standard Boolean has two possible values, true and false, an OracleBoolean structure has three possible values, True, False, or Null.

An OracleBoolean structure does not map to an Oracle Boolean data type; it is exposed as a convenience support class.

Constructors

OracleBoolean(Boolean)

Initializes a new instance of the OracleBoolean structure using the specified Boolean.

public OracleBoolean (bool value);
value
Boolean

The Boolean to be used as the initial value of the OracleBoolean structure.

OracleBoolean(Int32)

Initializes a new instance of the OracleBoolean structure using the specified integer.

public OracleBoolean (int value);
value
Int32

The integer to be used as the initial value of the OracleBoolean structure.

Remarks

If value is 0, the OracleBoolean is false; otherwise it is true.

Fields

False

Represents a false value that can be assigned to the stem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value* property of an instance of the OracleBoolean structure.

public static readonly System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean False;

Remarks

The False field is an OracleBoolean structure constant.

Null

Represents a null value that can be assigned to the stem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value* property of an instance of the OracleBoolean structure.

public static readonly System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean Null;

Remarks

The Null field is an OracleBoolean structure constant.

One

Represents a value of one that can be assigned to the stem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value* property of an instance of the OracleBoolean structure.

public static readonly System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean One;

Remarks

The One field is an OracleBoolean structure constant.

True

Represents a true value that can be assigned to the stem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value* property of an instance of the OracleBoolean structure.

public static readonly System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean True;

Remarks

The True field is an OracleBoolean structure constant.

Zero

Represents a value of zero that can be assigned to the stem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value* property of an instance of the OracleBoolean structure.

public static readonly System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean Zero;

Remarks

The Zero field is an OracleBoolean structure constant.

Properties

IsFalse

Indicates whether the current stem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value* is False.

public bool IsFalse { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if Value is False, otherwise false.

Remarks

If the Value is Null, this property still is false.

IsNull

Indicates whether or not the value of the OracleBoolean structure is null.

public bool IsNull { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the OracleBoolean value of the structure is Null, otherwise false.

IsTrue

Indicates whether the current stem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value* is True.

public bool IsTrue { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if Value is True, otherwise false.

Remarks

If the Value is Null, this property still is false.

Value

Gets the OracleBoolean structure's value. This property is read-only.

public bool Value { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the OracleBoolean is True; otherwise false.

Methods

And(OracleBoolean,OracleBoolean)

Computes the bitwise AND of two specified OracleBoolean structures.

public static System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean And (System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean x, System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean y);
x
OracleBoolean

An OracleBoolean structure.

y
OracleBoolean

An OracleBoolean structure.

Returns
OracleBoolean

The result of the logical AND operation as shown in the following table.

Value of x Value of y Result
truetrue``true
truefalse``false
falsefalse``false
trueunknown``unknown
falseunknown``false
unknownunknown``unknown

CompareTo(Object)

Compares this OracleBoolean structure to a specified object and returns an indication of their relative values.

public int CompareTo (object obj);
obj
Object

An object to compare, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

Returns
Int32

A signed number indicating the relative values of the instance and value.

Value
 Description
A negative integer
 This instance is less than value.
Zero
 This instance is equal to value.
A positive integer
 This instance is greater than value.
-or-
value is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

Remarks

Any instance of OracleBoolean, regardless of its value, is considered greater than a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

Equals(Object)

Compares the supplied object parameter to the OracleBoolean.

public override bool Equals (object value);
value
Object

The object to be compared.

Returns
Boolean

true if object is an instance of OracleBoolean and the two are equal; otherwise false.

Equals(OracleBoolean,OracleBoolean)

Compares two OracleBoolean structures to determine if they are equal.

public static System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean Equals (System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean x, System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean y);
x
OracleBoolean

An OracleBoolean structure.

y
OracleBoolean

An OracleBoolean structure.

Returns
OracleBoolean

An OracleBoolean that is OracleBoolean if the two instances are equal or OracleBoolean if the two instances are not equal. If either instance of OracleBoolean is null, the stem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value* of the OracleBoolean is Null.

GetHashCode()

Returns the hash code for this instance.

public override int GetHashCode ();
Returns
Int32

A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

NotEquals(OracleBoolean,OracleBoolean)

Compares two instances of OracleBoolean to determine if they are not equal.

public static System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean NotEquals (System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean x, System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean y);
x
OracleBoolean

An OracleBoolean structure.

y
OracleBoolean

An OracleBoolean structure.

Returns
OracleBoolean

An OracleBoolean that is OracleBoolean if the two instances are not equal or OracleBoolean if the two instances are equal. If either instance of OracleBoolean is null, the stem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value* of the OracleBoolean is Null.

OnesComplement(OracleBoolean)

Performs a ones complement operation on the supplied OracleBoolean structures.

public static System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean OnesComplement (System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean x);
x
OracleBoolean

An OracleBoolean structure.

Returns
OracleBoolean

The one's complement of the supplied OracleBoolean. If the Boolean contains a null value the result also is a null value.

Or(OracleBoolean,OracleBoolean)

Performs a bitwise OR operation on the two specified OracleBoolean structures.

public static System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean Or (System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean x, System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean y);
x
OracleBoolean

An OracleBoolean structure.

y
OracleBoolean

An OracleBoolean structure.

Returns
OracleBoolean

The result of the bitwise OR operation as shown in the following table.

Value of x Value of y Result
truetrue``true
truefalse``true
falsefalse``false
trueunknown``true
falseunknown``unknown
unknownunknown``unknown

Parse(String)

Converts the specified String representation of a logical value to its OracleBoolean equivalent.

public static System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean Parse (string s);
s
String

The String to be converted.

Returns
OracleBoolean

An OracleBoolean structure containing the parsed value.

ToString()

Converts the current stem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value* to a string.

public override string ToString ();
Returns
String

A string containing the value of the OracleBoolean. If the value is null, the string contains a null value.

Xor(OracleBoolean,OracleBoolean)

Performs a bitwise exclusive-OR operation on the supplied parameters.
